title: The Hardest Decision You've ever had to Make?
body:
I have an English course, and I need to find out 5 people's hardest decisions they've made in their lives. I though, since all my friends gave me similar answers, I would like to know this from you guys.
Feel free to put as much or as little information as you want.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riri99,realm=EUW,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=ABxEpK6t,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-12T14:42:12.986+0000)
>
> I have an English course, and I need to find out 5 people's hardest decisions they've made in their lives. I though, since all my friends gave me similar answers, I would like to know this from you guys.
> Feel free to put as much or as little information as you want.

I was 17, and forced with the decision on whether to put my German Shepard down. Knight was my best friend, and was with me through the hardest times in my life. At 6 years of age his spleen and kidneys were failing, and parts of his spine had fused together.
Oh God, that must have been heartbreaking, I'm so sorry.
It was, and here a year later it still hurts. I hope I have helped you with your endeavor.

The decision to go to grad school.

have self respect or main mage
